title: Downloading process going down
body: When i reached 80% when i was downloading LoL it stayed there for 14 minutes and then went down to 79% and it went down and down. How can i fix this and why is this happening? Please fix this.

replies.body:
Soooooo you're watching the install progress go backwards o_O? Straaaaaange things are happening. Most likely what happened is that your connection went dormant for a moment, while the progress bar kept going. Once the connection picked back up that progress noticed it was a little ahead of where it should have been sooooo it slyly tried to correct itself. 

Have you been able to get that download finished up yet or did you still need a little troubleshooting?
i waited and my internet connection was connected the whole time then it started going backwards
